metadata.name: Sub-Urban Saturnalia
metadata.description:
Made in Blender & Substance Painter  
2160x3840

A combination of two of my favourite things: History and Christmas.

This piece is a tongue-in-cheek representation of the origins and roots of Christmas come from other ancient festivals, such as Saturnalia and Yule. Without even realising it, we're celebrating multiple holidays during this time.

Merry Christmas
